summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing transportation charges for services rendered on specific dates in May 2005. It includes information about shipments involving Jeffrey Epstein and other individuals, along with associated costs and adjustments.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is listed as the sender for a FedEx shipment, indicating his involvement in the logistics of the package.

Lauren Kvanter sent a package to Nina Lows Sherioans as indicated in the shipment details.

keyFacts: The invoice details transportation charges totaling USD 107.32 for services rendered by FedEx.
Jeffrey Epstein is identified as a sender for shipments, indicating his involvement in logistics.
Alberto Pinto and Nina Lows Sherioans are identified as recipients of shipments sent by Epstein and Kvanter, respectively.
The invoice includes specific dates of pickup and delivery for the shipments.
There are adjustments and reasons for potential invoice changes mentioned, but no specific adjustments were requested in this document.
